functional_jobs.job_statement: When I visit the website, I want to quickly access my signed-up events and upcoming events, so I can easily manage my participation.
functional_jobs.current_solution: Using the website to navigate to my events.
pain_points: The website is cumbersome to navigate.
Lack of direct access to personalized information upon logging in.
functional_jobs.desired_outcomes: A more streamlined experience that allows me to find and manage my events easily.
functional_jobs.success_criteria: I can log in and immediately see my events and upcoming opportunities without extra clicks or confusion.

emotional_jobs.job_statement: When I use the website, I want to feel confident and informed about my participation, so I can enjoy my experience without frustration.
emotional_jobs.current_solution: Using the website, but feeling overwhelmed by navigation.
pain_points: Feeling confused and frustrated due to the website's layout.
Worrying that I might miss important events.
emotional_jobs.desired_outcomes: A sense of clarity and control over my event participation.
emotional_jobs.success_criteria: I feel calm and satisfied when using the website, knowing I have all necessary information at my fingertips.

social_jobs.job_statement: When I attend events, I want to be perceived as an engaged and active member, so I can build connections with others.
social_jobs.current_solution: Participating in events that align with my interests.
pain_points: Missing out on valuable events due to lack of guidance about their importance.
Not knowing how to better engage with the community.
social_jobs.desired_outcomes: To be recognized as a knowledgeable and active participant in the community.
social_jobs.success_criteria: Others acknowledge my participation and seek me out for social interactions at events.

supporting_jobs.job_statement: When I first join, I want to receive guidance on valuable events to attend, so I can maximize my engagement from the start.
supporting_jobs.current_solution: Trial and error in finding valuable events without clear guidance.
pain_points: Not being aware of the importance of certain events like the meet and greet.
Feeling lost and uncertain about where to focus my efforts initially.
supporting_jobs.desired_outcomes: To receive clear recommendations for events that will enhance my experience as a new member.
supporting_jobs.success_criteria: I feel well-informed and excited about participating in events that are valuable to my integration into the community.
